A '''pet cow''' is a pet variant of the [[cow]] introduced in [[25w14craftmine]].

== Spawning ==
A pet cow is spawned next to the player on [[Mine (dimension)|mine]] start when the "Pet Cow" [[Player Unlock]] is active.
